function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 among construction workers","Impact":"Disruption of workforce, project delays, and potential health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing strict physical distance policies, regular testing, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature scanners, and virtual meetings","People":"Construction workers, project managers, and laborers","Owner":"Government agencies, construction companies, and project managers"},{"Description":"Shortage of skilled laborers","Impact":"Reduced productivity, project delays, and increased labor costs","Mitigation":"Investing in training programs, apprenticeships, and recruitment drives","Technologies":"Virtual reality training, skill assessment tools, and remote recruitment platforms","People":"Construction companies, training institutions, and labor unions","Owner":"Construction companies and training institutions"},{"Description":"Challenges to productivity due to pandemic-related factors","Impact":"Decreased efficiency, safety concerns, and financial constraints","Mitigation":"Implementing safety protocols, providing language support, and managing cashflow effectively","Technologies":"Safety monitoring systems, translation tools, and financial management software","People":"Project managers, employees, and construction workers","Owner":"Project managers and construction companies"}]}
